# Sockets Docs

## Sockets

- [Sockets support](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/main/docs/fundamentals/networking/sockets/sockets-overview.md): Learn how the Socket class functions as a cross-platform abstraction of socket networking communication in .NET.
- [Use Sockets to send and receive data over TCP](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/main/docs/fundamentals/networking/sockets/socket-services.md): Learn how the Socket class exposes socket network communication functionality in .NET.
- [Use TcpClient and TcpListener](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/main/docs/fundamentals/networking/sockets/tcp-classes.md): Learn how to use the TcpClient class to create a socket to request and receive data using TCP in .NET.
